We had a view of the Blue Mosque and the Hagia Sophia from our balcony, and from the roof terrace we could not only see the city but also the many large ships moored out to sea and the Princes Islands in the distance. The service in the hotel was superb - efficient, friendly and helpful. There was great advice from Melisa about places to visit, the food was delicious, it was clean and sparkling and right in the centre of where we wanted to be. I would wholeheartedly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “perfect location and service with a smile”
Reviews.Author: JennySJohannesburg
Reviews.Content: If you go to Istanbul (which you have to do), and you have never seen the sights, then this is an absolutely ideal place to stay - the hospitality is warm and the level of service is of a high standard with plenty of gracious smiles and greetings as you come and go. We had a lovely room with a sea view, and couldn't have asked for more in terms of comfort - it's not the Ritz, but you can't substitute the charm or the location - it's in the heart of everything, and Melisa and the hotel staff are extremely helpful in giving tips, advice and general. We had a wonderful stay, and if we ever do return to Istanbul (which we sincerely hope we will), we will be sure to return to this charming hotel again and again! Highly recommende!

Reviews.Title: “Pretty city, pretty hotel”
Reviews.Author: IstanbulVisit
Reviews.Content: Hotel offers you all what you need: decent room with clean bathroom and an extensive breakfast. The location is super: very close to the most important buildings and very close to many good restaurants. The people working in the hotel are very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “The perfect place for discovering Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Hamam_DK
Reviews.Content: We were a group of 10 classmates - who for our 30'th anniversary decided to go to Istanbul for a 4 days stay. The Byzantium hotel was picked due to the perfect location - within walking distance to the major sights. Everything started out fine with the free pick-up service - which got us to the hotel without delay (except for the traffic). All staff was very helpful, friendly and always delivering an excellent service. Especially Melissa - the hostess - was extremely helpful. We had not planned a lot before leaving Denmark - so we just asked Melissa to give us some tips on activities to attend. Within a couple of minutes for example it was decided to do a boat tour on the Bosperus - a couple of phone calls later - everything was arranged - including pickup and return trip to the hotel - super service - You couldn't ask for more ;-) After a day of walking through all the major sights surrounding the hotel - having had dinner at one of the many local restaurants - right outside the hotel - returning to the hotel - getting a courtesy cup of coffee or tea - Melissa would be ready to help us with the next thing we'd like to do - very professional always with the extra smile - that made us feel very "home". I would be surprised if not some of us would return - together with our spouses.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, cleanliness and service”
Reviews.Author: Albuquerquetraveler2
Reviews.Content: The Byzantium Hotel meet and exceeded all of our expectations.We had requested the free pick-up at the airport, but we arrived around 1:30 in the morning and were somewhat skeptical. We were very pleased to see someone holding a sign with our name who whisked us to the hotel. The location was perfect, easy walking distance to the major sights, and time to walk back to the hotel for afternoon tea! Neighborhood was safe and had many restaurants and shops. The room was somewhat small but very clean and well appointed. The hostess, Melisa, was omnipresent and informative, helping us plan our days. A great value!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel in Old Town Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: KJBPacker
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for two nights and were pleasantly surprised. The hotel staff was extremely courteous and helpful. Most of them even knew English. The room was very nice and clean. It was also a decent size for being in Istanbul. Our room had a window with french doors that opened up to a breathtaking view of the Sea. Also the rooftop terrace provided a quiet, beautiful place to eat dinner, have some drinks, or just sit and talk. I will definitely stay here again when I travel back to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “exceptional service”
Reviews.Author: Florence_039
Reviews.Content: All the staff were really helpful and friendly. Melissa in particular provided us with good advice. The hotel is in an excellent central location just a few minutes from the Blue Mosque and with lots of restaurants just outside. There is also a roof terrace with really beautiful views. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends.

Reviews.Title: “warm and fuzzy”
Reviews.Author: bella053
Reviews.Content: the staff were very helpful and knowledgable. they always had a smile on their face no matter how many times you asked them something!! Melisa was sweet and I think she shoud get a raise in pay !! she goes "the extra mile" as we say in Canada. I would stay there again - in a minute

Reviews.Title: “Byzantium review”
Reviews.Author: SoftailCustom
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed at the Byzantium hotel several times. We enjoy staying at the Bzyantium. Melisa (customer relations) was very helpful, along with the other staff. I look forward to staying again at their hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Byzantium - All the previous reviews are right! It is a good find”
Reviews.Author: GBSLondon
Reviews.Content: Amongst the best things about this hotel are its location, its friendly staff, the fact that it is very clean and well maintained and that it is great value for money. We stayed in a sea view room on the fourth (top) floor which was quiet (away from the street side). A small point to notice is the double/twin bed choice. We booked a twin bedded room and I suspect that the hotel has only double beds as standard but supplies a single roll away bed if required. The roll away we had was comfortable enough but it does clutter the smallish room and placed across the window looking out to the sea view rather detracts from that as well. The double bed is very big and I would suggest that you go for that but if you must have twins maybe look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Funnny”
Reviews.Author: alwayscomingback
Reviews.Content: Staying in the Byzantium Hotel has been a very pleasant experience. Good atmosphere, very friendly staff, ready to help in case there is a problem, at your disposal twenty four hours a day, nice room, beautiful view of the old town and the See of Marmara from the terrace on the top of the building. Next time I go to Istanbul, and I go there very often, I would like to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and friendly treatment”
Reviews.Author: snoet35
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel in the middle of the old city. Excellent service and very friendly staff. We started with free drinks and explanation about the sightseeing of the city by Melisa. She was also very friendly and helpfull. The two man in our group visited a footballgame in the Besiktas area. Only with the help of the staff this good be organised.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - excellent location and facilities”
Reviews.Author: Malcolm36
Reviews.Content: We had a two-week holiday touring round various parts of Turkey and we spent 3 days at the start and the two days at the end at the Byzantium hotel. It is in a wonderful location; quiet but central for the sights. The staff are helpful and the facilities are good - the roof-top terrace is a wonderful place to sit with a drink and the Turkish bath/sauna was first-class and a delightful way to be pampered and relaxed at the end of the holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Great Choice”
Reviews.Author: jk990
Reviews.Content: My brother and I spent 4 nights in this hotel, which we selected due to its location and other guest reviews. We were very impressed with the cleanliness of the rooms and the friendly and helpful staff. On the same street were a variety of restaurants and bars including a sports bars showing rugby and football matches live! Proximity to public transport and popular tourist attractions is excellent.

Reviews.Title: “A weekend in heaven”
Reviews.Author: pbedijn
Reviews.Content: Our family (7p) stayed 4 days for a city tour and were welcomed by the outstanding staff from this hotel, Everything you might think of is available in the Hotel. Clean rooms, nice view , lots of restaurants in the neighbourhood, although the food in the hotel is perfect for both breakfast / supper at good prices. You are nearby the city centre from which you walk to all the major events, whether it's the grand bazaar, the spice market or the dozen of architectural and historical places. The terrace on top of the hotel makes you enjoy the wonderfull view over the see of marmera and even more the pleasant temperature. Would we go there again ? Yes, for sure if we decide to go to Istanbul we would stay again at this place. The staff even arranged for tickets for a footbalmatch the day before the match and accomodated for transportation. The people overall in Istanbul are friendly and cooperative and the foor is delicious.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: snazz35
Reviews.Content: My friend and I stayed here at the Byzantium Hotel for 4 nights and had an amazing time. The Hotel is situated in the heart of Istanbul, practically on the door step of the Blue Mosque, Topkapi and Ayasofia museums as well as close to the Grand Bazaar. The hotel is located in the most beautiful area named Sultanahmet so lively in the evenings and surrounded by many relaxing cafes and places to eat and chill. Also, the terrace roof tops of the Byzantium hotel offers amazing sea views and most of all the entire staff here at the hotel are top quality and very approachable.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: shunmugas
Reviews.Content: Byzantium is in a very convenient location nearer to the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia and the Cistern. Lot of eating places are nearby. Ofcourse the hotel breakfast is good and the evening complementary tea at the roof top is nice gesture by the hotel to make the staff and the guests to have friendly chit chats. All the hotel staff behave very well. Melisa deserves a special mention. This sweet young lady is the guest relations officer. True to her position she takes care of every guest with a warm smile. She arranges the sight seeing and dinner trips with real care. My stay at the during 21st to 24th Sept, 2009 was enjoyable. The fourth floor rooms have lovely balcony. I couldnot enjoy the balcony since it was raining those three days. R.Shunmugasundaram

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic vacation”
Reviews.Author: nikiRomania
Reviews.Content: We spend 8 days in the beautiful Istanbul, we had a fantastic time.Every day we had something to visit, to see.Istanbul is rich in sightseeing, moschees, museum.The Byzantium is the best choice if you want to have a great service and the view from the top of the hotel is unforgetable.The staff was always very helpful, the room is a little bit small, but always clean.The food, most of the time we had breakfast, is always fresh and tasty.Anyway it was a great experience and we`ll be back in Istanbul , in Byzantium hotel.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “It exceeded our expectation”
Reviews.Author: travelguyz243
Reviews.Content: We found the hotel through Trip Advisor and it was our first time to Istanbul. We weren't sure what to expect but it was a real home run. We had a room with a view of the Sea of Marmara on the 3rd floor. The neighborhood has similar 5 story buildings with other hotels and the area is perfect for tourists. The streets were quiet with lots of restaurants and only a few blocks from the Blue Mosque and Hagia Sophia. I had forgotten my power adapters and someone behind the desk lent me his Dell power adapter after hearing my request. That's the modern equivalent to the shirt off your back. Genghis checked us in and was very helpful while Melisa, the guest services host, made sure we had everything we needed.

Reviews.Title: “Most helpful staff ever.”
Reviews.Author: bunnySanFranc_sco
Reviews.Content: We spent a week at thÄ±s hotel wÄ±thÄ±n walkÄ±ng dÄ±stance of major vÄ±sÄ±tÄ±ng spots. The staff has been extremely helpful - especÄ±ally MelÄ±sa DonjukÃ¶k who solved our problems- gave great advÄ±ce about dÄ±rectÄ±ons and places to see and made us feel welcome treasured guests. The street of the hotel Ä±s Ä±n the mÄ±ddle of the old dÄ±strÄ±ct so that you are surrounded by cafes and shops and turkÄ±sh carpet stores that add great flavor. Almost every hotel and cafe has a rooftop terrace wÄ±th great vÄ±ews of the mosques and also of the bosphorus. Enjoy yourselves and Ä±f you have a questÄ±on ask MelÄ±sa!

Reviews.Title: “A 5-star-like hotel with a fair price!”
Reviews.Author: EduardoAndradeBrazil
Reviews.Content: I simply loved the hotel! Nice and well-educated staff! Incredible location! Best quality for a cery fair price!

HotelInfo.Name: The Byzantium Hotel & Suites
HotelInfo.Address: Akbiyik cad. No:25 (Old City) / Sultanahmet, Istanbul 34122, Turkey
